originalText.text: its nearby..for me ..It was ok..unfortunately my psychiatrist left..AGAIN..it seems like any clinic I go to I see a psych or a doctor for a 2-3 months stand then they leave‚Ä¶I dunno maybe it‚Äôs my back luck which I have plenty of..other then that it was ok‚Ä¶nothing special‚Ä¶the new psych is a bit awkward but it is what it is‚Ä¶

originalText.text:
At 1 point in time, back in 2004, they had horrible way form of communication. If u as client didn't know the trial of experience n have the right explanation for what u wanted or needed, u will only have choices that they pick 4 u.

Of course, 2 have, what everyone else out here wants; is some place new area n its safe n a place where u need to keep that apartment neat n clean.

The gr8est thing about this program was receiving the correct Case Manager for your issues n expectations.

Ms. Keisha Brown was the Gr8est Case Manager that Ever had worked for this agency. I love her extremely much for giving the Gr8est times. Only Ms. Brown gets üíØ% n üíØStars‚ùï‚ùï

They used to have a kindness rule to help those who wants to get by in life, or get their own lives back in order.

Those days are long gone now n their respect towards their clients are outrages n need 2 take a look at.

Especially, when you come across Deborah Kennedy she let's u know she gets paid to be a rude person. She said that they used to help people who are mentally disabled or mentally ill. After 2016, she said that's y, if get a job, let that job get n pay for your own apartment, that way u get whatever u want. ‚ùó‚ùó
